sig_info: Unlock a very low chance to draw the Legendary Boost Card.
Increase the potency of all Common Card effects by 20.34 to 60%.

PLATINUMPOOL\u2019S GUIDE TO THE BATTLER: Platinumpool draws 3 Cards before each fight. You thought I just made cards for Super Villains? Think again!
At the start of the fight, each drawn Card is revealed, granting a random effect.
There are 4 rarities of Cards: Brown Pants, Common, Rare and Epic. One of these is not like the others...
The rarity of a Card determines the chance it will be drawn. By default, Brown Pants Cards cannot be drawn. Epic Cards cannot be drawn when fighting on the final node of a quest.
Platinumpool can draw duplicates of all Common Cards.
Drawing Cards is not affected by Ability Accuracy modification.
WHEN BROUGHT BELOW 35% MAX HEALTH: Once per fight, Platinumpool gains a Regeneration Buff, recovering 1121.4 Health over 8 second(s).
WHEN KNOCKED DOWN: Platinumpool has a 25% chance to draw a Card when he is knocked down.
BASIC ATTACKS: Pause the duration of all Personal Bleed effects for 1 second(s).
HEAVY ATTACKS: When landing the first hit, gain a Prowess Buff, increasing Special Attack Damage by 25% for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 741.6 Direct Damage over 16 seconds. This Bleed scales with Special Attack Damage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If the Opponent is currently bleeding, Platinumpool inflicts a Stun Debuff lasting 2 seconds. Cruel… but very effective.
If Platinumpool completes his dance after this attack, he draws and reveals 1 Card.

The chance to draw a Brown Pants Card is increased each time Platinumpool draws a card in this way. While Platinumpool is defending Brown Pants Cards cannot be drawn. This is why I never risk it, you do NOT want to end up with Brown Pants.
Once per fight, if Platinumpool is interrupted before completing his dance during his Special 2 Attack, he gains a Regeneration Buff, recovering 700.88 Health over 8 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 1019.7 Direct Damage over 32 seconds. This Bleed scales with Special Attack Damage.
Discard all active Cards and draw 3 more. Hold on, there’s more?! I don't think I have the attention span for this...
PLATINUMPOOL\u2019S GUIDE TO THE BATTLER: Brown Pants: Reduce the potency of Platinumpool’s Block Proficiency, Perfect Block Chance, Critical Rating and Power Rate by -100% for 8 seconds. This card does not count towards the max.
Attack Boost: Increase Attack Rating by 61.8.
Heal Boost: Increase Regeneration Rate by 20%.
Stun Boost: Increase the duration of Stun Debuffs inflicted on the Opponent by 30% and reduce the duration of Stun Debuffs inflicted on Platinumpool by 30%.
Power Boost: Gain a Power Gain Buff, generating 75% of bar of Power over 20 seconds. Increase Power Rate by 10%.
Special Attack Boost: Increase Special Attack Damage by 15%.

Blood Drive: While the Opponent is bleeding and Platinumpool has a lower percent of Health remaining, attacking the Opponent inflicts a Bleed Debuff dealing 309 Direct Damage over 12 seconds. This Bleed scales with Special Attack Damage.

Throwing Fists: Gain up to 200% increased Special Attack Damage, increasing for each hit in the Combo Meter to a max of 200 hits. Every 15 hits in either Champion’s Combo Meter, gain an Unblockable Buff for 3 seconds.

Payback: When Platinumpool hasn’t been attacked by the Opponent for 7 seconds, gain a Payback Passive for 5 seconds. After Payback expires, gain a Regeneration Buff, recovering all damage taken while Payback was active over 5 second(s) and inflicting a Bleed Debuff on the Opponent, dealing 75% of all damage taken while Payback was active as Direct Damage over 5 seconds. This Bleed scales with Special Attack Damage.

Sumopool: While either Champion has a Fury effect, Platinumpool becomes Unstoppable against the last hit of incoming Special 1, Special 2 and Heavy Attacks. Additionally, damage received from this hit can’t exceed 15% of the Opponent’s Attack. When Platinumpool is in either corner, gain a Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 618 until Platinumpool leaves the corner.

Special Surprise: When activating a Special Attack, gain 1 Buff for each bar of Power filled by the Opponent, lasting 6 seconds. Buffs include Fury, Precision, Cruelty, Prowess, Unblockable, Indestructible and Unstoppable.

Mode Mixer: Rotate through Light, Medium, Heavy and Special Modes. Attacks associated with each mode gain 1545 Attack Rating and all other attacks have -80% Attack Rating. Modes rotate every 10 seconds. I totally zoned out, is he done? Alright! Let’s get back to fighting!

Payback: When Platinumpool hasn’t been attacked by the Opponent for 7 seconds, gain a Payback Passive for 5 seconds. After Payback expires, gain a Regeneration Buff, recovering all damage taken while Payback was active over 5 second(s) and inflicting a Bleed Debuff on the Opponent, dealing 75% of all damage taken while Payback was active as Direct Damage over 5 seconds. This Bleed scales with Special Attack Damage.

Sumopool: While either Champion has a Fury effect, Platinumpool becomes Unstoppable against the last hit of incoming Special 1, Special 2 and Heavy Attacks. Additionally, damage received from this hit can’t exceed 15% of the Opponent’s Attack. When Platinumpool is in either corner, gain a Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 2255 until Platinumpool leaves the corner.

Special Surprise: When activating a Special Attack, gain 1 Buff for each bar of Power filled by the Opponent, lasting 6 seconds. Buffs include Fury, Precision, Cruelty, Prowess, Unblockable, Indestructible and Unstoppable.

Mode Mixer: Rotate through Light, Medium, Heavy and Special Modes. Attacks associated with each mode gain 5637.5 Attack Rating and all other attacks have -80% Attack Rating. Modes rotate every 10 seconds. I totally zoned out, is he done? Alright! Let’s get back to fighting!

sig_info: Unlock a very low chance to draw the Legendary Boost Card.
Increase the potency of all Common Card effects by 20.34 to 60%.

PLATINUMPOOL\u2019S GUIDE TO THE BATTLER: Platinumpool draws 3 Cards before each fight. You thought I just made cards for Super Villains? Think again!
At the start of the fight, each drawn Card is revealed, granting a random effect.
There are 4 rarities of Cards: Brown Pants, Common, Rare and Epic. One of these is not like the others...
The rarity of a Card determines the chance it will be drawn. By default, Brown Pants Cards cannot be drawn. Epic Cards cannot be drawn when fighting on the final node of a quest.
Platinumpool can draw duplicates of all Common Cards.
Drawing Cards is not affected by Ability Accuracy modification.
WHEN BROUGHT BELOW 35% MAX HEALTH: Once per fight, Platinumpool gains a Regeneration Buff, recovering 4854.96 Health over 8 second(s).
WHEN KNOCKED DOWN: Platinumpool has a 25% chance to draw a Card when he is knocked down.
BASIC ATTACKS: Pause the duration of all Personal Bleed effects for 1 second(s).
HEAVY ATTACKS: When landing the first hit, gain a Prowess Buff, increasing Special Attack Damage by 25% for 10 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 3210 Direct Damage over 16 seconds. This Bleed scales with Special Attack Damage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If the Opponent is currently bleeding, Platinumpool inflicts a Stun Debuff lasting 2 seconds. Cruel… but very effective.
If Platinumpool completes his dance after this attack, he draws and reveals 1 Card.

The chance to draw a Brown Pants Card is increased each time Platinumpool draws a card in this way. While Platinumpool is defending Brown Pants Cards cannot be drawn. This is why I never risk it, you do NOT want to end up with Brown Pants.
Once per fight, if Platinumpool is interrupted before completing his dance during his Special 2 Attack, he gains a Regeneration Buff, recovering 3034.35 Health over 8 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Bleed Debuff, dealing 4413.75 Direct Damage over 32 seconds. This Bleed scales with Special Attack Damage.
Discard all active Cards and draw 3 more. Hold on, there’s more?! I don't think I have the attention span for this...
PLATINUMPOOL\u2019S GUIDE TO THE BATTLER: Brown Pants: Reduce the potency of Platinumpool’s Block Proficiency, Perfect Block Chance, Critical Rating and Power Rate by -100% for 8 seconds. This card does not count towards the max.
Attack Boost: Increase Attack Rating by 267.5.
Heal Boost: Increase Regeneration Rate by 20%.
Stun Boost: Increase the duration of Stun Debuffs inflicted on the Opponent by 30% and reduce the duration of Stun Debuffs inflicted on Platinumpool by 30%.
Power Boost: Gain a Power Gain Buff, generating 75% of bar of Power over 20 seconds. Increase Power Rate by 10%.
Special Attack Boost: Increase Special Attack Damage by 15%.

After Payback expires, gain a Regeneration Buff, recovering all damage taken while Payback was active over 5 second(s) and inflicting a Bleed Debuff on the Opponent, dealing 75% of all damage taken while Payback was active as Direct Damage over 5 seconds. This Bleed scales with Special Attack Damage.

Sumopool: While either Champion has a Fury effect, Platinumpool becomes Unstoppable against the last hit of incoming Special 1, Special 2 and Heavy Attacks. Additionally, damage received from this hit can’t exceed 15% of the Opponent’s Attack. When Platinumpool is in either corner, gain a Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 2675 until Platinumpool leaves the corner.

Special Surprise: When activating a Special Attack, gain 1 Buff for each bar of Power filled by the Opponent, lasting 6 seconds. Buffs include Fury, Precision, Cruelty, Prowess, Unblockable, Indestructible and Unstoppable.
